about_the_game:
"Let's cut to the heart of the matter: You're dead."

A haunting tale of discovery and redemption.

An amnesiac spirit begins her new life facing Izanami, the goddess of death. Though she is spared from the eternal flames of Hell, she has been chosen by Izanami to undertake a series of brain-bending trials!

Who is this spirit, and why is she not in the heavens where she thinks she ought to belong?

A hellish ordeal awaits, but does a satisfying answer lie at the journey's end?

Have a taste of the underworld.

Play through 10 of the full game's 35 levels (and counting!).

Place down your Spirit Gate, and return to it on a whim to navigate the increasingly labyrinthine platforming challenges.

Possess the humanoid and the formerly human; become a scarecrow, and scare crows (to death)!

Be the best, and look good doing it.

The demo for Afterlife Reverie contains full access to the Wardrobe feature.

With every claimed Scrap and S rank, a new article of clothing manifests in the Wardrobe!

Give our spectral heroine a distinct style, and take your place as the coolest ghost in the Underworld!

Demo features:

  • 10 of the game's 35 levels.

  • Access to the three customizable categories of the Wardrobe.

  • A trip through the beautiful and hand-crafted worlds of Izanami's Palace and Ne-no-Kuni.

  • A tough but fair ranking system that pushes you to your limit.

  • A compelling narrative with distinctive characters.

Disclaimer

Progress in the demo does not transfer to the full game.

name: Afterlife Reverie Demo
short_description: A challenging 2D puzzle platformer where a damned spirit must navigate her way through the Underworld and beyond in search of her past. Take over bodies and teleport your way to the answers you seek!
